data.title: Staff
data.text:
Provides leadership and is responsible for all aspects of the Human Resources Department including supervision and evaluation of functional area Directors, management and oversight of operations, employee relations, policy development and compliance with federal and state laws. The AVP/CHRO has responsibility for setting the vision and creating strategies and initiatives designed to support APSUs mission.

Primary Areas of Responsibility:

Immigration

Employee Relations

Strategic Overview/Management

Workplace Investigations

Works closely with the AVP/CHRO and serves as a partner and resource for the campus by leading and guiding recruitment, staff development and training, and employee relations. Ensures that HR best practices and continuous improvement are implemented across the campus.

Primary Areas of Responsibility:

Employee Recruitment

Positive Discipline and Employee Grievances

Supervisor/Manager Coaching

Works closely with the AVP/CHRO and is the chief point of contact between Human Resources, Information Technology and systems vendors. Oversees interfaces for Banner, PeopleAdmin, and other processes and serves as the primary contact for process issues and end user support, and prepares most internal and external reports from the department. Leads coordination and integration of efforts among Human Resources and other customer-servicing departments by planning and implementing workflow strategies and operations to improve systems and produce more cost-effective business processes. With the use of technology, spends time on strategic compensation management for improved cultural and goal alignment.

Primary Areas of Responsibility:

Reporting (Internal & External)

Banner Data Management & Testing

Annual Compensation Adjustments

3rd Party Software Management

Educational Increases

HR Website Management

Works closely with the AVP/CHRO and is the chief point of contact for all benefits and retirement needs. Provides new employees with an overview of benefits and all APSU employees with a variety of resources and assistance during any life changing events from the time of hire to the time of separation.

Primary Areas of Responsibility:

Benefits Onboarding

Benefits Changes & Annual Enrollment

Family & Medical Leave

Employee Consultations

Retirement Services

The HR Coordinator provides a wide range of human resources support and consulting services while ensuring smooth operations of the HR department. Serves as a link between the HR department and APSU students and employees.

Primary Areas of Responsibility:

Temporary Staff Advertisement

Temporary Staff Onboarding

Customer Experience

Under the supervision of the Director of Human Resources, and in collaboration with the Assistant to the Provost (Office of Academic Affairs), the Human Resources Coordinator acts as a liaison between human resources and academic affairs.

Primary Areas of Responsibility:

Assists with hiring processes for all faculty (full-time and part-time)

Graduate Assistant Onboarding

Part-Time Instructor Advertisement

Part-Time Instructor Onboarding

Part-Time and Full-Time Faculty Evaluations

Oversees office operations to ensure HR provides a transactional and first line best-in-class support services to our employees and supervisors, and ensures processes and procedures are completed efficiently and right first time, every time. Builds strong and trusted internal working relationships across the campus and functions to ensure our HR processes and services support the university's needs.

Primary Areas of Responsibility:

Student Onboarding (General Campus, FWS, & RA)

Student/RA Data Entry

Employment Verifications

Student Worker Supervision
